titleStmt.title: An answer to several late treatises, occasioned by a book entituled A discourse concerning the idolatry practised in the Church of Rome, and the hazard of salvation in the communion of it. The first part by Edward Stillingfleet ...
titleStmt.author: Stillingfleet, Edward, 1635-1699.

publicationStmt.publisher: Printed by R.W. for Henry Mortlock,

notesStmt.note: A second part with title, A second discourse in vindication of the Protestant grounds of faith ... London, 1673, was published during Trinity term.
Reproduction of original in Duke University Library and Huntington Library.
